item.title: Switching to Community or Enterprise
item.description: If you are considering upgrading to KrakenD Enterprise or downgrading to KrakenD Community, these are the things you should have in mind. Downgrade to Community If you are a KrakenD Enterprise Edition user and you want to switch to the Community Edition, these are the guidelines you should follow to keep your installation working. Obtain the Community Edition and replace it by the Enterprise one Make the configuration migration as described below Start the server with the modified (if necessary) configuration Configuration migration You can run a configuration file designed for the KrakenD Enterprise in a Community Edition straight away, except if you have one of the following options that you should remove and will make your server panic during startup:
